description: 11. What about rumours that some foods can prevent or treat the infection?
title: 11. What about rumours that some foods can prevent or treat the infection?
content: There is no known cure for Ebola. You are advised to seek credible health advice about the Ebola Virus Disease from the health center near you or the Ministry of Health on the number given below. While there is no specific licensed drug against Ebola, the best treatment is intensive supportive care provided in the clinics by health workers using strict infection control procedures. If these are strictly observed, survival rates of Ebola patients improve.
